column4: An NBC web site tells me I need to upgrade flash to version 9, even though I already have it. I suspect that NBC is discriminating against linux users because of it's affiliation with MicroSoft, but I suppose there could be a bug in my computer. Would some people here please tell me if http://www.nbc.com/The_Tonight_Show_with_Jay_Leno/video/episodes/ works for you, or says you need to upgrade?
That's interesting. Thanks. Two questions: 1.) Which web browser worked and 2.) Which version of flash is reported by http://kb.adobe.com/selfservice/viewContent.do?externalId=tn_15507?
